column4: hi, i've issue with cedega 6.0.2+World of Warcraft... almost everything is allright except right-displaying some chars... for example: when i write in game ".,()", i will get ++++
you will Cedega is not free and open source, you will have to talk to the company who makes cedega. Use Wine instead, Wow runs perfectly in Wine. http://wowwiki.com/Linux/Wine
i tried it, i wasn't succesful with wine
